item.title: By: Jason Cosper
item.dc:creator: Jason Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/a-man-duh/#comment-183">Liz</a>.
I've read a few articles citing <a href="http://www.thegr.com/index.cfm?event=ProductDetails&CategoryID=81&ProductID=43" rel="nofollow">this after shave balm</a> from The Gentlemens Refinery as a very nice one. If you want to try it out but can't justify $40, consider grabbing the travel-sized one as a tester.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Liz.

I’ve read a few articles citing this after shave balm from The Gentlemens Refinery as a very nice one. If you want to try it out but can’t justify $40, consider grabbing the travel-sized one as a tester.

item.title: By: Liz
item.dc:creator: Liz
item.description: What do you recommend for razor burn on a sensitive face? It hurts the poor hubby to shave his face..
item.content:encoded: What do you recommend for razor burn on a sensitive face? It hurts the poor hubby to shave his face..
